settings.custom_liquid:
Return Policy

1. Return/Exchange Procedures

Returns/exchanges of eligible items will be accepted only within 7 business days including the day of delivery.

Returns/exchanges due to customer preferences (e.g., incorrect sizing, color mismatch) cannot be accepted.

Please contact our Customer Center before initiating any return/exchange. Our support team will guide you through the process.

If the return is caused by the consumer, consumer should be responsible for the shipping fee.
The specific fee should be based on the express company you choose.
If due to our reasons, the goods received are damaged or not correct, and the consumer is not required to bear the shipping fee for this reason.

2. Shipping Fees for Returns/Exchanges

We will cover shipping costs ONLY in the following cases:

  • Incorrect item received
  • Defective product
  • Damage during shipping

Returns/exchanges will NOT be accepted in these cases:

  • Order cancellation, return, or exchange due to customer preference
  • Items with removed tags/packaging
  • Used, washed, stained, or odorous items
  • Customer-damaged items

3. Non-Acceptable Return Cases

Order cancellation, return, or exchange due to customer preference

Items with removed tags/packaging

Used, washed, stained, or odorous items

Customer-damaged items

4. How to Request Returns/Exchanges

Submit your request through our inquiry form before proceeding.

We will provide return instructions after verification.

5. Important Notes

Returns may be rejected if items are not in resalable condition.

Items with removed tags, signs of use/washing, stains, or odors cannot be returned.
